id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this event.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

location.description: Unique location scheme and identifier combination.

beginDate.description: The date of the beginning of the lactation.

endDate.description: The end date of the the lactation. This occurs when the animal is dried off, dies or calves again.

parity.description: The parity of the animal during this lactation.

lactationLength.description: The length of the lactation until this moment.

milkAmount.description: The amount of milk produced in this lactation.

fatAmount.description: The amount of fat produced in this lactation.

proteinAmount.description: The amount of protein produced in this lactation.

lactosisAmount.description: The amount of lactosis produced in this lactation.

lastTestDay.description: The date of the last test day in the lactation.

lactationType.description: This type of lactation based on lactation length that is delivered.
